text: Wooden bleachers line the surrounding walls of the Olympi sized pool. The room is empty. MOONLIGHT shines through t skylights, reflecting off the water. Nikes, Jay-Z T-shirt and an iTouch are piled at the pool's edge. CAMERA CRANES INSIDE the water. AT THE POOL'S BOTTOM, we find... PERCY JACKSON, age 17, sitting with his legs crossed, dre in cargo shorts. His eyes are closed. His long, dirty blonde hair floats around him. His expression is peaceful

Ever since I was a kid, I liked being in the water. It's where I do my best thinking. Sometimes, when I concentrate, I hear this distant voice... like somebody trying to guide me, give me direction... Weird, huh? Percy opens his eyes, shoots to the surface, fills his lu with air.
Probably just water on the brain.

A large campus in upstate New York. Old, brick buildings scattered across several well-manicured acres. Percy walk alone across campus, dressed like a Venice Beach surf rat listening to an iPod. His attitude is tough, hard, cool.

My name is Percy Jackson. Until a few months ago, I was a student here at Yancy Academy. The kind of place where parents send their "troubled" kids when no one else will take them. A fight breaks out between a group of students. Teachers to break it up. Percy keeps on walking.
A 52 year old, grey haired, bearded teacher in a wheelcha MR. BRUNNER, lectures to a group of kids who would rather elsewhere. Percy stares at his textbook.
My so-called troubles, had impressive- sounding names-- Percy squints at the text. The words MORPH into odd shape
--like "dyslexia" and "attention deficit disorder." But I had a better name for them: boredom.

Percy's roommate is asleep, SNORING. A pair of rusted, metallic FOREARM CRUTCHES lean against his roommate's bed Percy lies awake, the walls around him covered with poste of SURFERS riding EXTREME WAVES. Tacked to the wall is a photograph: Percy and his mom, in happier times.

I was also supposed to have some displaced rage because my father abandoned my mom before I was born. But quite honestly, none of that really mattered... Distant THUNDER roars. Percy gets up, looks out his windo STORM CLOUDS form in the sky, obscure the moon.
..-because my real troubles were just beginning.
The sky above Manhattan is heavy with dark, ominous cloud A "YANCY ACADEMY" BUS is parked in front of the museum.

A spacious, glass-domed room filled with ancient GREEK ARTIFACTS, rusted WEAPONS, and ARTWORK. In the center of room, are imposing SCULPTURES of the TWELVE OLYMPIAN GODS MR. BRUNNER lectures from his wheelchair

There are twelve Olympian Gods. The major three were brothers, who went on to rule the world. Zeus became the King of the gods and ruled the sky. His brother, Poseidon ruled the sea. And their other brother, Hades, ruled the underworld. A group of fairly disinterested high school SENIORS stand around Mr. Brunner. Percy stands off to the side, sweatsh pulled up to hide his ipod headphones. GROVER, Percy's roommate, stands beside him. Grover is overweight, with curly brown hair, glasses, a wispy goatee and a perpetual expression of lust and mischief. Using his cell phone, Grover snaps a photo of the Aphrodite statue's breasts. Brunner notices. Frowns. Not amused.
Grover. Please. Grover looks up. Guilty. Brunner extends his hand.

A little more respect for the Gods. Grover sighs, hands over the cell phone. Brunner looks at the photos, holds up the camera for the class to see. The kids chuckle at the image of Aphrodite's breasts.
What does this tell us about Grover?
He's a sex addict.
Possibly. Grover may be a tad more, hormonally challenged than most teenagers. But he still shares a similar weakness with all of us. Lust.
(leans to cute girl) I knew we had something in common.
It's something the Greek Gods also shared with us. There were several occasions, when the Gods would come down to earth and... how shall I put this?...
Hook up.
They would hook up with mortals. Several kids snicker.

The children of these unions were half- God and half-human. Can anyone tell me what they were called? Mr. Brunner scans to DREW BOBOFIT, a tough, angry, mean spirited bully with a buzzcut and tattoos.
Mr. Bobofit?
Bastards? Mongrels? Mutts?  4. Drew's two friends, two hoodlums named TONY and VINCE, la Brunner scowls, looks around.
Anyone else? Percy? But Percy doesn't hear, lost in his music. Grover uses on of his crutches to yank the headset out of Percy's ear.
Huh? What?
What is the proper name for the offspring of a human and a God? Percy narrows his eyes, thinks, finally... it comes to hi
Demigods.
Very good, Mr. Jackson. (to Drew Bobofit) Mr. Bobofit, you and the rest of the class obviously need a bit more incentive to learn this material. Perhaps a quiz will help. Tomorrow. Chapters 7 and 8.
Percy and Grover enter. Grover, using his crutches, walks with a pronounced limp.
I can't get above a D in most classes. But somehow, without even studying... I get this stuff...
(ironic smile) Maybe it's in your blood. The bathroom door FLIES OPEN. Drew and his friends enter, shove past Grover, nearly knocking him down.
Out of the way, Crip.
Shut your mouth, Drew. Drew turns, walks back to Percy, getting in his face.
You're the one who should keep your mouth shut, Jackson. If you weren't so busy kissing Brunner's ass, we wouldn't be having a quiz tomorrow.
Big deal. You have to study. Grow up.
Not all of us can get a fancy tutor by pretending we have dyslexia.

I'm not pretending. I mix things up. Like right now, I could swear your dick is where your head is supposed to be. Furious, Drew and his gang DRAG Percy him into a STALL. D tries to SHOVE Percy's head into the toilet bowl. Percy STRUGGLES to break free. Grover BANGS on the stall door.
Percy!? As Percy's face gets closer to the toilet water, the wate begins to CHURN and BUBBLE, growing in POWER.
Stop! Drew keeps PUSHING. The water CHURNS violently.

I... said... STOP! Suddenly, a BLAST OF WATER EXPLODES out of the toilet bow The water moves with EXTREME FORCE and a definite PURPOSE It SHOOTS past Percy, STRIKES Drew and the boys with the power of a FIREHOUSE, blows them out of the stall and... ..-ACROSS the bathroom floor, right past Grover. They lan UNDER the urinals. Grover SEES Percy step out of the stal Percy is SHAKEN, CONFUSED. UNSURE what just happened.

Percy... Let's go... Drew and the boys get back on their feet, SOAKED. They BL Percy and Grover's exit. A CREAKING SOUND fills the room. Followed by a low, GROAN NOISE and the sound of pipes RATTLING.  6. Then -- CRACK! CRACK! -- several HAIRLINE FRACTURES form the walls and on the floor, spreading out like spiderwebs Urinals and sinks EXPLODE, firing like missiles across th bathroom. Water RUSHES in through the holes in the wall, forming into the shape of several snake-like TENTACLES. The water-tentacles WHIP through the room, like living creatures. They ATTACK Drew and his friends. Grover watches in AMAZEMENT. Percy is BAFFLED, standing i the center of the maelstrom. The floor beneath Drew's feet CRACKS OPEN. A GEYSER of wa shoots upward. The Powerful water LIFTS Drew into the air The bathroom door FLIES OPEN. MR. BRUNNER rolls in. STUNN by what he sees. The Geyser quickly DISSOLVES. Drew FALLS to the floor, ri on top of his soggy, freaked-out friends. The other water STOPS FLOWING, retreating back into the pipes, leaving PO OF WATER everywhere.
What's going on?!?
Jackson. He blew up the bathroom. Mr. Brunner looks very CONCERNED. Percy's expression is equal parts amazement, confusion, and fear.
I didn't... I don't... it just-- Mr. Brunner nods, speaks softly, almost knowingly.
--happened.
Angry, Percy is sitting across from Mr. Brunner's desk. Grover stands in the background.
Detention!? But it wasn't my fault... I don't even know how it happened...
I believe you, Percy. But Dean Campbell wants to suspend you. I argued for a compromise.
One month detention is a compromise?
For you? Yes. You've been to six different schools in eight years. You've got a D-minus average. You're on very thin ice.
Perfect. I like cold water.
You really want to be expelled from another school?
Do I really give a damn?

Maybe you don't. But your Mother does. (soft, solemn) Don't let her down again. The words sting. Percy looks out the window. Troubled, upset. Mr. Brunner feels Percy's torment. Mr. Brunner tak a THICK BOOK off his shelf.
I want you to read this.
You know that I can't--
Try. Mr. Brunner places the book in front of Percy. The writin on the cover is in GREEK. Percy refuses to look at it.

Outside, THUNDER rumbles. We are inside a dark, ancient library with high vaulted ceilings and lead glass windows Rows and rows of towering bookshelves stand along the wal each with its own ladder-on-wheels. Percy sits at a long wooden table, in the middle of the r He is alone, save for the LIBRARIAN, a small elderly woma Percy is trying to read Mr. Brunner's book, staring at th GREEK LETTERS on the cover. He squints. The Greek letters MORPH INTO ENGLISH LETTERS. They read: GUIDE TO GREEK MYTHS AND LEGENDS." Percy is surprised, pu the book close and reads to himself.

"The Father of the Olympians was Kronos. He was the King of the Titans-" (pauses, a small smile) I can... read?... There is a LOUD CRASH. The sound of BREAKING GLASS. Percy LOOKS UP and sees... A CREATURE, hidden in the SHADOWS, LEAPS through the wind The creature LANDS on the floor and slowly RISES UP. It's over TWELVE FEET TALL. The librarian SCREAMS. The creature PULLS BACK its arm, SWIPES at the librarian with tremendous force. The librarian is KNOCKED OFF her feet, FLIES through the and SLAMS into the wall. OUT COLD. Percy STANDS. TERRIFIED. He starts to BACK AWAY. The creature TURNS, faces Percy and STEPS FORWARD. INTO t light. It is the MINOTAUR. HALF MAN. HALF BULL. MUSCULAR, with a long snout, cruel yellow eyes, and battered razor-sharp horns. Seeing Percy the Minotaur ROARS, then SPEAKS in an inhuman VOICE.

Where is it?! Percy turns and SPRINTS toward the door. The Minotaur RACES after him. Faster than Percy, the Minotaur is UPON HIM in seconds. The Minotaur GRABS Percy, LIFTS him into the air and HURL him at a bookshelf. Percy SLAMS into the shelves, FALLS t the floor, buried under a PILE OF BOOKS. Percy is STUNNED. The wind knocked out of him. The Minota RUNS FORWARD, lifts its arm, about to PUMMEL Percy... Percy ROLLS OUT of the way. The Minotaur's arm JUST MISSE Percy and SMASHES a hole in the library floor. Percy gets to his feet, DASHES around the corner. The Minotaur FOLLOWS. Percy KICKS one of the wooden ladders i the path of the creature. The Minotaur SLAMS through the ladder as if it were balsa wood. Percy heads for the LIBRARY DOORS.  9. The Minotaur RUNS up, SWINGS its razor sharp claw across Percy's back. The claws RIP through his jacket. Percy CRI OUT in pain, falls to his knees. The Minotaur MOVES IN FO THE KILL. The library doors BURST OPEN. The Minotaur STOPS, TURNS t the sound.
Percy! Mr. Brunner races into the room on his wheelchair, holdin simple BALL POINT PEN.
Use this. Mr. Brunner THROWS the pen to Percy. Confused, Percy CATC the pen. Brunner SHOUTS.
Click it!
What!?

Click it! The pen is mightier than the sword. Percy CLICKS the pen. IT TRANSFORMS INTO A LARGE, SHARP M SWORD! Percy stares at the blade in DISBELIEF. The Minotaur TURNS BACK to Percy, who is on his feet, wielding the heavy sword. Percy LUNGES FORWARD and SWINGS. The tip of the sword SLI DEEP ACROSS the creature's arm. The Minotaur CRIES OUT. BLOOD seeps from its wound. This only makes the creature ANGRIER. The Minotaur CHARGES Per Percy SWINGS again, this time SLICING DEEP into the Minotaur's TORSO. The Minotaur HOWLS in pain, holding his bleeding CHEST WO With a final GROWL, the Minotaur TURNS and LEAPS OUT of t library window. Percy looks around the room, a gigantic mess of DESTROYED books, furniture and bookcases. Percy glances to the swor It CHANGES BACK into a common everyday ballpoint pen.
What... was... that thing?  10.
We have to go. It's coming back for you.
Coming back!? It was hurt--
You temporarily scared it off. A Minotaur can only be killed by severing the horn from its body. Brunner EXITS, followed by a confused Percy.
A Minotaur! ?
Grover is asleep, an open copy of MAXIM lying on his blan Percy and Brunner enter.
Pack only what you need. Fast.
Can you tell me what's going on?!

No time. Grover. Out of bed. Grover groggily gets out of bed, LED into the hallway by Brunner. Percy grabs a backpack and begins to PACK. From the hallway, we hear Grover and Brunner's WHISPERING. Per stops packing, slowly walks to the door, EAVESDROPS. Outside, THUNDER RUMBLES. Brunner WHISPERS to Grover.
Today. In the bathroom. The water. It was a sign. (a beat) Percy's powers have begun to surface.
Why now?
It happens when their lives are in danger.
Danger?
He was attacked. By a Minotaur.  11.
What? But why?
Listen. What do you hear?
Thunder.
But no lightning.
(trying to understand) Yeah...
Stolen. And they suspect Percy.
Impossible.
I know. But because of who he is... Everyone thinks he did it.
Oh, man... Nowhere is safe for him.
Only one place.
Right... You want me to take him there?

(nods ) Pick up Sally along the way. Grover nods. An ANGUISHED ROAR echoes from outside. The C of the Minotaur. Grover and Brunner turn, HURRY back to Percy's bedroom. Percy RACES back inside, resumes packing
Grover and Percy sit inside a crowded subway train. Grove is SILENT. Percy is ANXIOUS, wants information.
Would you please tell me what's going on? What's all this stuff about my powers starting to surface? What powers? And me stealing something!? Is that why nowhere is safe for me?  12.
(softly, paranoid) Quiet. Keep your voice down. They could be listening.
Who? Who could be listening?
(whispering) Not here. Not with all of these people around. No one can be trusted. Grover glares at an ELDERLY LADY who is staring at him. Percy shakes his head, thinks Grover is crazy.
A working class neighborhood. Grover and Percy exit the subway, HURRYING along the sidewalk. Grover is TENSE, ANXIOUS, suspiciously eyeing anyone who passes by.
Why did Brunner send you home with me?
To keep you safe.
You're gonna' keep me safe?
I'm your protector. Percy responds with an incredulous LAUGH.
What's so funny?
Nothing. It's just... well, you--
(angry, hurt) What? You think because I'm disabled?... I'm not capable of keeping you safe?... Huh?... Is that it?...
I didn't say that.

(insulted, softly) You didn't have to.  13. Percy sighs, feels TERRIBLE. They arrive in front of a small, mean, WOODEN TWO-STORY HOME, sandwiched between RO of similar homes. They walk to the door and ENTER.

GABE UGLIANO, Percy's 39-year old, sloppy, overweight stepfather sits at a table in this cramped apartment, pla cards with four POKER BUDDIES. Several empty BEER BOTTLES are on the table. 70's SOUTHERN ROCK plays in the BG.

This disgusting slob is my step-father Gabe Ugliano. I call him "Smelly Gabe" because he never showers, puts Tabasco and garlic on everything he eats, and... Gabe lifts a butt-cheek off his chair and lets one RIIIII
You get the picture. Sometimes when Gabe drinks too much... he fights with my Mom... screams at her, slaps her around... A real prince.

(calls OFFSCREEN) Sally? Hey? Can we get a couple beers? Percy's mom, SALLY,enters, carrying a six pack. Sally is her mid-30's, attractive, beaten-down by a hard life. There's a toughness, an inner strength, a radiant glow ab her. Gabe takes the beers, looks at his friends.
Ya' know, guys... If God wanted men to get their own beer, he wouldn't have invented wives... Sally forces a smile, places the beers on the table.
My mom, on the other hand, is an angel. I could never understand what she was doing with this jerk. Gabe pulls Sally in for a sloppy kiss, GRABS her ass.
Just kiddin', babe. C'mere...
Get your hands off my Mother. Everyone TURNS. Percy and Grover stand in the doorway. Sally is SURPRISED, but delighted by the appearance of Pe
Percy! Sally rushes to Percy, embraces him. She notices Grover, kisses his cheek.
Grover?... You too?... (suspicious, to Percy) What are you doing home?
Probably got his ass kicked out of another school.
Disrespect my Mom again and you'll get your ass kicked out in the street.

Yeah!? Let's see what you got-- Gabe stands, in a drunken rage, GRABS Percy by the collar Ready for a FIGHT. Gabe's gonna' kill him. Grover BRINGS DOWN his crutch. HARD. ON TOP off Gabe's foot. Gabe CRIES OUT. Grover feigns an apology.
Oh, geez. Sorry. New crutches. Grover MOVES his crutch from Gabe's foot, LIFTS IT... thi time SLAMMING Gabe in the balls. Gabe CRUMBLES to his kne
I am so clumsy. Are you okay? The wind KNOCKED OUT of him, Gabe is helped back into his chair by his friends. Grover LEANS to Percy, whispers.
I'm your protector. You cool with that? Percy hides a small smile, NODS. Sally hurriedly LEADS th boys out of the room, into the kitchen.
Why do you stay with that smelly pig?
Not another word. He's been good to us in ways you'll never know. (to Grover) Now... what's going on?
We have to go. To the camp.
Right now? Why?
Percy's in danger. They're coming after him. They think he stole-- From OFFSCREEN, we hear a LOUD, INHUMAN ROAR. Grover pani
The Minotaur!
Relax... It's only Gabe.
We'll take Gabe's car. C'mon. They hurriedly exit through the BACK DOOR. Grover quickly SNATCHES a jumbo bag of Cheetos.
A battered, rusted orange '78 CAMARO, complete with racin stripes, SPEEDS out of the garage.
The Camaro is the only car on the road, moving deeper int the dense countryside. On one side of the road, miles and miles of TREES. On the other side, a hilly FIELD.
Sally is at the wheel. Grover is in the back seat, nervou gobbling Cheetos and checking a ROAD MAP. Percy turns to Sally. He's UPSET. WORRIED.
Mom, I don't know what's going on. But I didn't steal anything. I swear...

I believe you, honey. I know that you're scared and confused right now. Trust me, I didn't want any of this for you. I thought you could have an ordinary life. (warm, loving) But nothing about you could ever be ordinary.  16.
So where are we going?
Think of it as a camp. A camp for special people. Like you. And your father.
(bitter) Great. A camp full of losers.
Your father was not a loser. He was a great... man.
A great man who abandoned his family.
He did not abandon us, Percy. He had to leave. He couldn't live in our world.
Our world? Who was my Dad? £.T.?
Percy. You know all the myths about the Greek gods and goddesses? Well, they're not really myths. The gods are alive. They're here.
What?...
You saw the Minotaur...
Right. Okay. But, I mean... if the Gods are real, wouldn't they be in Greece?
They were. A long time ago. But the Gods tend to follow the heart of the West. They've been settled in America for the past two centuries.
What does this have to do with me?
Remember what Brunner said in class?... Sometimes when the Gods are down here on Earth, they fall in love with mortals... have kids...  17.
Demigods...
Half-god and half-mortal. There are hundreds living in the world right now. Some lead normal lives, others become pretty famous.
What are you saying?
(turns to him, dead serious) You're a Demi-God. Percy is stunned. SPEECHLESS.

The Camaro passes a field of grazing CATTLE. As the car passes, one of the cows RAISES its enormous head, above t rest. It's a large BULL'S HEAD with TWISTED HORNS. It follows the Camaro with GLOWING YELLOW EYES. The MINOTAUR
The car continues down the deserted, DARK ROAD. Percy is still shocked by the news. Sally EXPLAINS.
I was young when we met, just out of school, working at a resort for the summer, right on the ocean. Your Father was...not like any guy I had ever met. He was just... dazzling.
They're always dazzling.
We were very much in love... And then... you came along... But he had to leave...
So he did abandon us.
He had no choice. The Gods, by their very nature, can't live among mortals. They are responsible for an entire universe...
Then maybe they shouldn't have kids.  18.
Your Father loved you, Percy. Leaving you was probably the most difficult thing he ever did.

(pauses, softens) What was his name? Sally turns, ABOUT TO TELL Percy who his Father was. A lo INHUMAN ROAR fills the air. Grover LOOKS OUT the window. When SUDDENLY... CHUD! A COW lands in the road, in front of them. Sally screams, SWERVES to miss the animal.
The Camaro FLIPS onto its side, CAREENS off the road. It SKIDS into a ditch, coming to a STOP beside a VAST FOREST tall PINE TREES. SMOKE pours from beneath the hood.
In PAIN, Percy grabs his head. He sees Sally, SLUMPED ove the wheel.
Mom?... Mom?!?... Sally stirs, more STUNNED than hurt.
I'm okay. How's Grover? He raises his head up from the backseat.

Is it just me, or is it raining cows? The car suddenly SHAKES, from an IMPACT TREMOR. This is followed by several IMPACT TREMORS. Something very large, very HEAVY, is running toward them. Percy looks out the m splattered back window. He SEES... COWS, being THROWN INTO THE AIR, flying LEFT AND RIGHT. A MONSTROUS THING plows through them, heading TOWARD THE CA

Everyone out! Sally THROWS HERSELF against the driver's side door. It i JAMMED SHUT. Percy TRIES TO OPEN his door. Also jammed. The creature is GETTING CLOSER... CLOSER...  19. Grover REMOVES his sneakers, strips off his baggy pants.
What are you doing?
My job. Grover lifts his feet, revealing that they are... THICK, FURRY HOOVES. Percy stares at Grover's hooves, SHOCKED.
Okay. So you're half donkey.

Goat actually. Grover PULLS BACK his leg. With a POWERFUL KICK, he SHATT the rear window and CLIMBS out of the back window. Percy ASSISTS his mom out of the car. When Percy climbs out, he sees Grover standing in all his glory... He's a SATYR.

Follow me. With tremendous speed and agility, Grover RUN/GALLOPS tow the PINE FOREST. Percy and Sally FOLLOW. They glance over their shoulder and see... The MINOTAUR, stepping into the road, spotlighted by the car's HEADLIGHTS. The creature stops at the car, SNUFFLES nuzzling at the windows. A few feet away, at the edge of the pine forest, Sally, Percy, and Grover stop, looking back at the Minotaur. The Minotaur unleashes a CHILLING, ANGRY HOWL, turns toward S and the boys.

He just picked up our scent. Run! They SPRINT OFF, into the pine forest. The angry Minotaur PICKS UP the Camaro, LIFTS IT and HURL the car in their general direction. The car FLIES toward Percy, Sally and Grover, SMASHING through the pine trees. Sally TACKLES Grover and Percy, PINNING THEM to the groun The car FLIES OVER their heads, MISSING THEM by inches. I lands with a CRASH, only a few feet in front of them.
Gabe's gonna' be pissed.
I always hated that car.  20. They quickly get back on their feet, hearing the Minotaur SMASHING and BREAKING the trees, as he CHARGES after them

C'mon. We're almost there. Grover POINTS just ahead of them. There is an OLD WOODEN GATE/ARCHWAY, leading into a small clearing. Faded GREEK LETTERS arc across the top of the gate. Percy, Sally and Grover RUN FOR THEIR LIVES, toward the g The Minotaur CHASES them, GETTING CLOSER... Percy, Sally and Grover reach the gate. Percy LOOKS UP at the letters. PERCY'S POV: The letters SHAPE-SHIFT, MORPH into English letters. Percy reads the words.

Camp. Half. Blood. Grover GRABS Percy, PULLS HIM THROUGH the open wooden gat Sally STOPS at the entrance. She DOESN'T go through. The Minotaur CRASHES through a row of pines. MOVING FAST. Less than FIFTY YARDS AWAY. Percy looks back to his Mom, sees that she's STOPPED.
Mom! What are you doing!?
I can't go any further. Percy REACHES OUT, GRABS his Mother's arms, TRIES TO PULL through the Camp Entrance. AN INVISIBLE, FORCE FIELD WALL prevents Sally from entering. Percy CAN'T PULL HER THROUG
I can't go through. I'm not like you. The Minotaur STOMPS forward. Only a FEW FEET AWAY.
I love you, Percy. Now go. Please.
I'm not leaving without you!

You have to. You're meant to. Sally PULLS HER ARM FREE from Percy. She takes a step bac just as the Minotaur ARRIVES. Percy REACHES for his Mothe again, but the beast grabs Sally and pulls her AWAY.  21.

No!!! Up ahead, Grover SKIDS to a stop, looks back and SEES... The Minotaur GRAB Sally by the neck and LIFT her off the ground. She STRUGGLES, kicking and pummeling the air. The Minotaur CLOSES HIS FISTS around Sally's neck. She ME into light, becoming a shimmering, GOLDEN FORM. There is BLINDING FLASH. And Sally DISAPPEARS. Simply... GONE.
Percy's face is covered with ANGER and GRIEF. He is fille with newfound strength, a rush of BURNING ENERGY. Percy CHARGES toward the beast. Grover runs toward him, YELLS -

Percy! Don't-- Percy RUNS up to the Minotaur and LEAPS onto its back. Th creature TOSSES HIM OFF like a rag doll. The force SENDS Percy FLYING INTO A TREE. HARD. He FALLS onto the ground. Motionless. EYES CLOSED. The Minotaur LOWERS ITS HEAD and CHARGES Percy. At the la moment, Percy ROLLS OUT OF THE WAY. The Minotaur JUST MISSES him and PLOWS into a tree. HEAD FIRST. The Minotaur's horn GETS STUCK in the trunk. With LOUD ROAR, the Minotaur PULLS BACK its head. There is a HORRID SNAP of bone. The Minotaur's horn SNAPS OFF, RIPPE from its head, now STUCK in the tree. FURIOUS, the Minotaur turns to Percy and ROARS. A weakene Percy takes a step back, his legs SHAKING. The Minotaur RACES toward him, ready to FINISH THIS. As the Minotaur CHARGES, Percy RUNS to the tree. He PULLS the Minotaur's horn OUT OF THE TREE. Percy STABS the creature, PLUNGING the horn into the midd of the Minotaur's chest. The Minotaur HOWLS IN PAIN. BLAC BLOOD pours from the wound. The Minotaur FALLS to the ground. DEAD. Breathless and weak, Percy STANDS over the fallen Minotau Percy DROPS the horn, LOOKS UP, the trees SPIN. Percy's e ROLL BACK. Softly, he speaks...
Mom... He FAINTS.  22.

Percy is lying on a HOSPITAL BED. ANNABETH, a 17 year old girl with stunning GREY EYES and curly blond hair, stares down at him. She's wearing body armor and is covered in sweat and dirt, but she's still radiant.

This is him? Doesn't look tough enough to kill a Minotaur. I'm not impressed. Percy's eyes slowly flutter OPEN. He stares up into Annabeth's hypnotic, grey eyes, sees all of her BEAUTY. Light reflects off her armor making her look otherworldly
Hello--
You drool when you sleep. Wipe your mouth. Percy wipes his mouth, Grover steps out from behind Annab

Welcome back, Buddy. Percy notices the cacophony of MOANS and GROANS. He sees that his bed is one of several dozen, inside of a large, stone walled INFIRMARY. Kids, ages 11-18, are in the beds They are BATTERED and BRUISED, some with broken bones.
Where am I?
The infirmary. You've been unconscious for three days. Percy tries to sit up, but he's IN PAIN. Annabeth shoves GOBLET filled with a GOLD, GLOWING LIQUID in his face.
Drink this. It'll make you feel better. Percy sniffs it, not sure.
Don't be a weasel. Percy smiles, takes a SIP. Grover and Annabeth watch him expectantly. He looks instantly REJUVENATED.
Good stuff. What is it?  23.
Ambrosia and nectar. Food of the Gods.
Tastes like my Mom's caramel brownies.

And that's how yours truly, Percy Jackson, son of Poseidon, ended up on the highway to Hell.

head_text.subj: AC/DC'S "HIGHWAY TO HELL" FILLS THE SOUNDTRACK. CAMERA

text: DOLLIES into the map, zeroing in to the first location: NEW JERSEY.

A deserted, two lane highway in the badlands of New Jerse The Greyhound bus pulls to the SIDE OF THE ROAD. Percy, Grover, and Annabeth step off the bus, all wearing back- packs. The bus PULLS AWAY. Across the street, is... AUNTIE EM'S GARDEN EMPORIUM. It's a rundown, corrugated steel "SHACK" with dead plants, cement fountains, and a d weathered statues -- CHERUBS, LIONS, ANGELS. The place fe deserted, save for TWO CARS parked in front: A rusted PIC UP TRUCK and a 1993 CADILLAC ELDORADO with ILLINOIS plate
You're sure this is the place?
That's what the map says.
The kids ENTER. It's dark, dusty, and DESERTED.
Hello? Anyone here? Grover picks up a cobwebbed phone, LISTENS for a dial ton
Dead.

Auntie 'Em must've gone back to Kansas. Percy opens the CASH REGISTER's drawer. It's full of Amer CASH and several ancient Greek GOLD COINS (DRACHMAS) . Percy pushes open the creaky SCREEN DOOR, leading to the lot. He steps OUTSIDE.
Check this out.  47.

Annabeth and Grover JOIN Percy. A winding, serpentine gra path leads through acres of STATUARY. Hundreds of LIFE-LI STATUES create a maze-like atmosphere. There are ANIMALS, TOURISTS, SOLDIERS from all eras, GARGOYLES, etc.
Must be thousands of 'em. How are we supposed to find a pearl in this cement stack?
You're the grand strategist. Grover walks to an old "ENJOY COCA-COLA" ice cooler.
Anyone thirsty? He opens it, startled to find dozens of LIVE MICE scurryi around inside. He quickly CLOSES the door.
Never mind.

Let's split up. Check every statue. The pearl could be inside one of them. They walk into the statue maze and SPLIT OFF in three directions. As they do, a GARGOYLE'S HEAD appears to TURN ever so slightly, in their direction.

Grover HOBBLES among the statues, TAPPING them with an ANCIENT DAGGER. The statues are all SOLID and very LIFE- LIKE, in strange, everyday poses. Grover taps a ROMAN SOLDIER. SOLID. Grover moves on, the Roman Solider BEGINS TO MOVE and LIFTS HIS SWORD. Grover, hearing a NOISE, LOOKS BACK. NOTHING. The Roman Soldier is STIFF. But now his sword is HELD HIGH. Grover DOESN'T NOTICE and MOVES ON.

Percy TAPS the statues. All SOLID. He comes upon a relatively new statue: a MIDDLE AGED MAN wearing a Chicag Cubs hat, holding a map as if he were asking for directio There's a look of HORROR on the man's face. At the end of the row, Percy sees a LARGE STATUE of a SLEEPING, COILED COBRA. Percy walks TOWARD it.  48.
Annabeth taps each statue and MARKS THEM with an "X" afte she's examined them. From the corner of Annabeth's eye, s sees a QUICK BLUR. Someone is RUNNING BETWEEN THE STATUES
Hello? Is someone there? She turns and... SHOCK! Annabeth runs into a crazed, SCAR HYSTERICAL WOMAN, in her late fifties.
Have to leave... have to get out... She's coming...
Who's coming? What's going on?
We stopped... For directions... Bill... My husband... Stone... The Woman GRABS Annabeth, PULLS her through the maze...

As Grover walks, FIVE MORE STATUES come to life. They FOL Grover like cement zombies, lead by the Roman Soldier. Ev time Grover TURNS BACK, the statues assume their FROZEN POSITION. Grover stops in front of a statue of an OLD SAT

Hey. You look like my Uncle Ferdinand. But that's impossible. Uncle Ferdinand was killed by Medusa-- (sudden panic, swallows) Auntie 'Em. WHACK! A CONCRETE SWORD BLADE BARELY MISSES Grover and SHATTERS Uncle Ferdinand. Grover SPINS and finds himself SURROUNDED BY LIVING STATUES. They are CLOSING IN ON HIM.
Percy! Annabeth! We're in Medusa's lair!

Standing in front of the coiled Cobra as he hears Grover' warning. Suddenly the Serpent's EYES OPEN, revealing that one of them is a GREEN PEARL. The Cobra STRIKES at Percy. He ROLLS AWAY just in the nic of time. Percy WHIPS out his pen, CLICKS IT. The pen transforms into RIPTIDE...
The Hysterical Woman LEADS Annabeth through the statue ma
Have to... get out... before... she finds us... Annabeth tries to break free, but the woman's grip is STR
The statues CLOSE IN. Grover RAISES his crutches like they're Chinese fighting sticks. He KICKS OFF his shoes, exposing his HOOVES.
You ugly stiffs want a fight? Grover goes all Shaolin-Satyr on their stone asses. He WHACKS them with his crutches, KICKS them with his powerf hooves. ONE KICK and the statues CRUMBLE.

The Cobra's tail WHIPS at him. Percy SLAMS into a group o statues, KNOCKS THEM OVER like bowling pins. Percy RISES The Cobra STRIKES AGAIN. Percy DIVES out of the way... ++.jJust as GROVER leaps into the action. The Cobra TURNS toward Grover. And in that instant, Percy HURLS his sword Riptide FLIES THROUGH THE AIR and IMPALES the Cobra, righ BELOW THE EYE. The Cobra FALLS, CRUMBLING into a hundred pieces. The GRE PEARL (the size of a golf ball) ROLLS to Percy's feet. He picks it up. Grover picks up the sword and it TURNS BACK a pen. He HANDS IT to Percy, who is concerned, worried.
Where's Annabeth?
The Hysterical Woman continues to PULL Annabeth through t maze of statues. Annabeth finally STOPS the woman.
Look! You've got to tell me what's going on! Who are we running from?!?

Leaving so soon? Annabeth turns to the direction of the VOICE. A WOMAN, dressed all in black, is standing there.  50. She is wearing a LONG BLACK GOWN, that covers everything her hands. Her hair is wrapped in a BLACK TURBAN. She wea IMPENETRABLE BLACK SUNGLASSES. This is MEDUSA.
Leaving so soon? The Hysterical Woman SCREAMS. Annabeth BACKS AWAY. Medusa looks at Annabeth, sniffs the air around her.
You have such beautiful gray eyes. I've only seen eyes like that once before... Medusa slowly starts to UNWRAP her turban.

+..on the face of the bitch that did this to me. As she unwraps her turban, we see the FACE of Medusa for first time... greenish, cracked, distorted, and PULSATING She removes the last of the turban, revealing the LIVING, HISSING SNAKES that are her hair. The snakes are SNAPPING each other. ANGRY. Annabeth is FREAKED.

The daughter of Athena here in my emporium. And my hair so unruly. Medusa walks to the Coca-Cola cooler and OPENS IT. Medusa bends down, LOWERS her head into the cooler. When she pul her head out, each of her hair-snakes has a MOUSE in its mouth, swallowing them. It's a HORRIFIC SIGHT. This cause the snakes to CALM down slightly, stop fighting each othe Medusa approaches the girls. Annabeth recoils in horror a the snakes SNAP at her. Medusa LOWERS her sunglasses...

I've seen your eyes. It's time for you to see mine. She takes off her glasses, revealing her GLOWING YELLOW E Annabeth quickly LOOKS AWAY. The Hysterical Woman CAN'T RESIST a peek. She looks and is HYPNOTIZED. As she stares into Medusa's eyes, she begins to TURN TO STONE. Her hand TURNS TO STONE, still holding Annabeth's arm. Annabeth shudders, CAN'T BREAK FREE from the cement grip. Medusa MOVES her face to within inches of Annabeth's face The snakes "FEEL" Annabeth's face, as if they were the fingers of a blind person. Annabeth keeps her EYES SEALED  51.
What a wonderful addition you'll make to my collection. Or perhaps I'll send you back to Mom. One piece at a time.
Percy and Grover WATCH from the cover of the statues.
How are we supposed to fight something we can't look at?
You can look at her reflection. Ina mirror or something. Grover pulls an iTOUCH from his pocket, holds it up. Medu is visible in the REFLECTIVE BACK. Percy GRABS it.

You get Annabeth while I distract Medusa. Percy sighs, SNEAKS OFF, iTouch in one hand, the pen in t other. He DUCKS behind a large statue, holds out the iTou to get a VIEW of Medusa, who is still in Annabeth's face.
Sooner or later you will open those big grey eyes. The temptation to look is too hard to resist.
I could resist your ugly-ass face for a looooong time. Medusa SPINS around, hisses.
Who is that!? Who's there!? Medusa WALKS to the edge of the statue maze. She looks around, SNIFFS the air. Percy MOVES SWIFTLY from statue t statue, keeping a view of Medusa in his iTouch mirror.
I can smell you, Demigod. Come out and I may let you live. Medusa WALKS into the statue maze. Seconds later, Grover RUNS OUT, to Annabeth. He WHISPERS to her.
You can open your eyes. It's me, Grover.  52.
(opens her eyes) Grover! Thank Gods. Auntie Em is-- Grover SLAMS HIS CRUTCH INTO the arm of the Hysterical Wo statue. It CRUMBLES, releasing Annabeth.
Medusa. We know.
Medusa RACES through the maze, honing in on Percy. Even t snakes are SEARCHING, LOOKING AROUND. But Percy RUNS AHEA watching her every move in his iTouch's reflective surfac
Who are you? Why are you here?
The name is Percy Jackson... He stealthily DUCKS to another position. Medusa FOLLOWS.
Son of Poseidon. As Medusa gets CLOSER and CLOSER, Percy grips his PEN.
So it is true. The mighty Poseidon has a child. Percy DOESN'T RESPOND. Medusa is TOO CLOSE. A few more steps and she'll be in STRIKING DISTANCE.
You can't hide for long, Lightning Thief. These statues are not just my victims... She lets out a LOUD, TERRIFYING HISSSSSSS.

They are my slaves. The statues near Percy COME TO LIFE, GRAB HIM. The iTouch FALLS to the ground. Medusa STEPS forward, gets RIGHT IN Percy's face. He CLOS his eyes. The snakes are all posed to STRIKE at once.

I'll give you a choice. Give me the lightning bolt... Or die by the poison fangs of my serpents...  53. A CAR HORN BLARES! Medusa LOOKS UP, sees... Her rusted PICK-UP TRUCK, CRASHING through the path of statues, HEADING DOWN THE PATH, toward them. GROVER is at the wheel, ANNABETH is beside him. Both are BLINDFOLDED. Percy uses the distraction to KICK Medusa away. He CLICKS the pen, turns it INTO THE SWORD and BREAKS FREE from the statue, just as... ...the PICK-UP PLOWS into the statue maze. Statues TUMBLE and CRUMBLE. As the dust clears, Medusa LOOKS AROUND angrily. She sees NO SIGN of Percy. She sees the iTouch, lying in the rubble. Medusa PICKS IT UP. She turns it around to the SHINY SIDE. She sees PERCY'S REFLECTION. He STANDING RIGHT BEHIND HER.

Add this to your playlist. Percy SWINGS THE SWORD. WHACK! Medusa's head GOES FLYING. It HITS the windshield of the truck and FALLS to the grou Grover and Annabeth GET OUT of the truck, TAKE OFF their blindfolds. Percy joins them and they see the HAIR-SNAKES DRAGGING Medusa's HEAD away, across the ground.
That's something you don't see every day.
We should take it with us.
The head?! You're kidding.
Her eyes still work, dead or alive. Never know when something like that might come in handy.
(nods, to Grover) Gimmee' your jacket.
What?

Your jacket. We need something to wrap it in. At least until we can get an ice bucket. Grover reluctantly gives Percy his jacket. Percy grabs th head, WRAPS IT UP. Percy TOSSES the head back to Grover, FUMBLES IT like a hot potato and TOSSES it to Annabeth.  54. She TOSSES IT into the back of the truck where it lands w a SQUISHY THUD. Percy holds up the PEARL for all to see.
One down, two to go.
Percy opens the cash register, takes the cash and GOLD DRACHMAS .
Medusa's TRUCK peels out onto the highway.
Grover DRIVES. Percy and Annabeth are in front with him. Percy STUDIES the MAP. Annabeth holds the green pearl up the light.
You think Luke could've warned us that Medusa was guarding this...
Maybe he didn't know.
(glances to Percy) Where's the next location? On the map, the second address APPEARS...
Nashville. Grover NODS, FLOORS the gas. The Shocking Pink's "VENUS" BLASTS from the radio. DISSOLVE TO:

Annabeth and Percy are fast asleep (her head is on his shoulder). Grover's head is bobbing as he fights off slee The pick-up GLIDES into the on-coming lane of traffic. HEADLIGHTS shine on them and a car HOOOOOONKS! Grover jerks awake, sees the oncoming car, SCREAMS, and SWERVES BACK into the right lane. Percy and Annabeth JOLT AWAKE as the pick-up FISHTAILS in the shoulder, then gets back on the road. Grover is STARTLED, FREAKED.
We should stop for the night.  55.
Somewhere on the I-70 WEST heading toward Missouri. The Motel is located next to an INTERSTATE EXIT. The VACANCY LIGHT IS ON. The Pick-Up truck PULLS into the parking lot
A cramped, dusty reception area. The MANAGER, a scrawny 7 year old, sits behind the desk. Grover, wearing his handi disguise, enters with Percy and Annabeth.
We need a room.
You got an I.D.? The manager stares them down SUSPICIOUSLY. Percy takes ou wad of cash, peels off five twenties. The Manager grabs a bill, holds it up, looks at it, then looks at Percy.
The spittin' image.
Percy opens the door. They enter the small, MUSTY old roo There is one QUEEN bed. Grover's pockets are packed with countless vending machine SNACKS.
Only one bed.

I'll sleep in the chair. Grover dumps out the pile of snacks onto the bed. He PLOP down in the chair, clicks on the TV and starts eating a Snickers' Bar, wrapper and all. Grover goes to the ADULT MOVIE PAY CHANNELS and makes a selection. Annabeth GRABS remote and TURNS OFF the TV. Grover GLARES at her.
What?! I can't watch a movie?! Percy unwraps a Snickers, sits on the bed, looks to Annab
Pretty big bed. Maybe we could both-- She throws a PILLOW at him.
Floor or bathtub. Your call.  56.
(sighs, stands) I'll get some ice.

Percy fills the sink with ICE and places Medusa's head in He has DUCT-TAPED HER EYES SHUT, so there is no danger of stoning themselves. Percy and Annabeth (she's wearing cot boxers and a T-shirt, ready for bed) both grimace at the head, its skin BLUISH, surrounded with FLOPPY DEAD SNAKES
Percy! Get in here!
Percy and Annabeth hurriedly enter. Grover, covered in crumbs, surrounded by half eaten junk food, finishes chug a COKE, then starts CHEWING ON THE CAN. He looks at Percy
You're on TV. ON THE TV SCREEN: a NEWS ANCHOR sits at a desk, a school yearbook photo of PERCY is on the screen behind her.

---and still no word on the disappearance of seventeen-year old Percy Jackson and his mother Sally. Gabe Ugliano, Sally's husband, maintains that the 17 year old Percy is behind the disappearance. Cut to: GABE, standing in front of his garage, being interviewed by a REPORTER.
Kid's been in trouble his whole life. A real loser. Percy watches the screen. Stoic. Annabeth looks at him sympathetically.
I mean... What kind of deranged person kidnaps his own mother?
Mr. Ugliano is offering a cash reward for any information on the whereabouts of his wife, son--
Step-son.  57.
Stepson.
Kid's no blood relation to me. Percy looks away. Grover tries to lighten the situation.
Cool. You're a fugitive.
This is going to complicate things. Percy doesn't respond. He stands, exits, SHUTTING the doo behind him. Annabeth and Grover exchange a CONCERNED look
Percy SWIMS the length of the pool underwater, purging hi emotions. When he surfaces , Annabeth is standing there.
Nice work today, saving us from Medusa... Thanks. (extends her hand) Friends? Percy reaches up... and pulls Annabeth into the pool.
Mess with the son of Poseidon... you're gonna get wet. Annabeth splashes frantically, like she's drowning.
Can't... swim... Percy panics, reaches for her...and she leaps up and shov his head under the water. When he surfaces, she's LAUGHIN
Mess with the daughter of Athena... you're gonna' get outsmarted every time.
Then I'm glad you're on my side. They exchange a warm smile.
So... Why do our parents hate each other?  58.
They both wanted to be Patron God of Athens. The people chose Athena. Poseidon was insulted. He cursed the city so they would never have enough water. Our parents have hated each other ever since.
My old man sounds like a bigger jerk than my Stepfather.
I doubt that. Besides, that's the historical version... I think there was another reason your Father got so angry at my Mom...
Why's that?
He had a huge crush on her. And she blew him off.
How do you know it wasn't the other way around?
You haven't met my Mom.
What's she like?

Intense. Always busy. The rare time we spend together, she criticizes everything I do, points out all my weaknesses... She says it's to make me stronger and wiser. But it only pisses me off. (rolls her eyes, smiles) She'd be furious if she knew I was helping you.
(playfully, a touch serious) So that's why you came... rebelling against Mommy... You want her to notice you, see how tough you are...
Maybe. A little. But I have other reasons too. They look deep into each other's eyes, intense attraction  59.
Like what? They slowly lean into each other, lips getting closer...
Like... Their lips are almost touching. Their kiss is INTERRUPTED by... A FLASHLIGHT BEAM, shining on them.
What's goin' on here?
We're... just talking.
No funny business in the pool. Get Out. Percy and Annabeth climb out, their moment gone. The mana walks away. The two share an awkward beat of silence.
I'm... I'm gonna' chill out here for a while. You can stay if you--
Actually, I'm pretty tired. I think I'll call it a night. Goodnight, Percy. She gives him a peck on the cheek, walks away to the room Percy sighs. FRUSTRATED.
Percy is ASLEEP. At the BOTTOM OF THE POOL. He opens his eyes, SWIMS to the surface and gets out.

The Manager pours himself a CUP OF COFFEE, accidentally spills some on the desk. He grabs a USA TODAY newspaper t sop up the mess. Percy's PHOTO is on the front page. The headline: "TEEN BOY STILL MISSING; WANTED FOR QUESTIONING He RECOGNIZES Percy, picks up the paper, examines it.
The spittin' image.
Annabeth is in bed, waking up. Grover walks out of the bathroom holding the MEDUSA HEAD by the snake-hair.  60.
Alright. Who put Medusa's head in the sink?

The Manger is peaking in through a gap between the curtai He sees Grover HOLDING up the SEVERED MEDUSA HEAD. The Manager gags, holds back vomit. Terrified, he backs away from the window... and BUMPS right into... Percy.
Looking for something? The Manager, petrified, tries to speak.

You... you... killed her... You killed your own mother. Percy, confused, sees the USA TODAY clutched in the Manag hand. Percy sees his photo on the front page, looks to th window, sees Grover, inside the room, holding Medusa's he The Manager pulls out a PISTOL, aims at Percy.
Murderer!
No, I'm not... It's not what you think... The Manager BACKS AWAY, still holding the gun on Percy. Percy steps forward, trying to explain.

You got it all wrong... The Manager CLICKS the pistol. READY TO SHOOT. Percy clos his eyes, CONCENTRATES. The pool's water RIPPLES. A HUGE WAVE erupts over the side of the pool. The Manager LOOKS sees the wave RISE over the pool. It ENGULFS the Manager SWEEPS him down the street. Percy RACES BACK to the room.
Guys! We're checking out!
The Pick-up CRUISES on a two-lane blacktop highway. The weather is getting more OMINOUS. Dark CLOUDS. Heavy WINDS

Everyone is quiet, reflective. Annabeth is ASLEEP between Grover and Percy, her head on Percy's shoulder. He's look out the window, watching the landscape pass before his ey  61. Percy looks to Annabeth, resting peacefully on his should A small SMILE appears on Percy's face.
The pick-up passes a sign that reads: WELCOME TO NASHVILL

The pick-up truck pulls up. Percy. Grover and Annabeth st out. Percy wears sunglasses and a baseball cap, pulled do to conceal his identity. CAMERA PULLS BACK. We are in the middle of a LARGE PARK, crowded with people. Percy. Grove and Annabeth walk through the park, passing families on PICNICS, JOGGERS, STREET PERFORMERS, to stand before... THE PARTHENON. An exact DUPLICATE of the ancient Greek architecture, directly in the middle of a modern Nashville park. The juxtaposition of past and present is STRIKING. Percy, Gro and Annabeth examine the map, look up at the Parthenon.
The second pearl. It's in there. Somewhere.
Wish Luke's map had been a little more specific than "Parthenon".

Filled with TOURISTS. Percy, Grover and Annabeth ENTER. T space is surrounded by imposing columns, housing a 41 FOO STATUE of the Goddess ATHENA. It's as if they've stepped back in time 4000 years. Annabeth, slightly moved, looks the statue. Percy notices the name ATHENA on the base of statue, turns to Annabeth...
Your Mom? Annabeth nods.
Does she really look like that?
Slight resemblance.
Nice rack.  62.
Excuse me?!
Nothing. Hormones. Sorry. Percy's eyes WIDEN. He sees something OFFSCREEN.
Up there. Percy points to the TOP of the statue. Grover and Annabet look up. The SECOND GREEN PEARL is embedded in the middle Athena's crown, surrounded by rare, colorful JEWELS.
Too easy.
Not really. It's 40 feet in the air. The place is filled with tourists and security guards. Are we supposed to just jump up and grab it? Long pause. Percy smiles. AN IDEA.

Maybe. CLOSE-UP: A SHOE BOX. Percy's hands come into frame and open the box lid. Insid are the WINGED SHOES, given to Percy from Luke. CAMERA PU BACK. The three of them sit at a PICNIC TABLE in the park Percy PICKS UP the winged shoes, examines them.
Luke gave me these for a reason. Tonight, after closing hours... I'll sneak in.

CLOSED for the evening. The surrounding park is DESERTED, save for ONE SECURITY GUARD, who sits in a small booth, several feet from the Parthenon entrance. The guard is an acne faced, gawky 23 YEAR OLD REDNECK. HIDING in a tall section of bushes, Percy, Annabeth and Grover keep watch on the Parthenon. Percy takes off his SNEAKERS, replaces them with the WINGED SHOES. He stands, SHUFFLES, like a RUNNER preparing for a marathon. He look at Grover and Annabeth.
Any idea how these things work?  63.

You break into a run, build up speed... Like a jet on a runway. But it takes a bit of-- Percy RUNS FORWARD, through the parking lot. He's MOVING FAST. Suddenly, he begins to LIFT OFF... Like a JET... Pe is PROPELLED TEN, FIFTEEN FEET in the air... Then... Percy FLIPS in mid-air. HEAD OVER HEELS. He FALLS STRAIGH to the ground. He LANDS HARD. On his BACK. SMACK!
--practice. Annabeth and Grover RUN to Percy, who struggles to his fe slightly SHAKEN. DAZED. The wind KNOCKED out of him.
Okay, okay... I can do this...

The GUARD sits in his booth, head buried in a copy of Car Driver magazine. High ABOVE, out of the guard's view, the SILHOUETTE of Percy FLIES across the moonlit sky. Percy SWERVES, BOUNCES... flying slightly ERRATICALLY. He starting to GAIN CONTROL, maintain his BALANCE...staying THE AIR. Percy MOVES FAST. Annabeth and Grover WATCH from the safety and cover of th BUSHES. Percy FLIES toward the Parthenon, SOARS through the colum

Percy FLIES inside, moving QUICKLY. He SOARS toward the STATUE OF ATHENA. Percy's flying is getting a bit more CONFIDENT, SMOOTH... ANNABETH and GROVER watch from the bushes. NERVOUS. TENSE Percy FLIES directly toward Athena. He is MOVING FAST. He LOOKS DOWN at the shoes. A WORRIED LOOK covers his face. Grover, concerned, TURNS to Annabeth.

I forgot to teach him to slow down-- Percy CAN'T SLOW DOWN... INCHES from the ATHENA statue. He CRASHES into the statue.  64. The statue TILTS... BEGINS TO FALL... Percy FLIES BACK around, managing to STOP the statue from HITTING the floor. The statue TEETERS at a 45 degree angl Using all of his strength, Percy PUSHES the statue UPRIGH INTO PLACE. There is a small GRINDING SOUND as the statue FITS BACK onto its base. The guard LOOKS UP for a moment. Did he HEAR something? The guard SHRUGS to himself, GOES BACK to reading his magazine. Percy, SWEATING, NERVOUS... PERCHES on the statue's shoul Percy is TINY, compared to the large face of Athena, Moun Rushmore-like in its majestic grandeur. Percy LOOKS UP, sees the green pearl, the centerpiece of Athena's crown. Percy REACHES UP... he can only TOUCH the bottom of the statue's ear lobe. Percy begins to CLIMB UP onto the statue's earrings, TOWARD the top of her head. Annabeth and Grover watch in breathless ANTICIPATION. Percy CLIMBS UPWARD. The statue's surface is SMOOTH... SLIPPERY... Percy's foot SLIPS... He FALLS. Percy SAVES himself, GRABBING onto Athena's CROWN. Annabeth and Grover CATCH THEIR BREATH. Percy gets his footing, begins to CLIMB to the top of Athena's crown. From here, Percy is able to REACH OUT and TOUCH the green pearl. With some difficulty, Percy manages to REMOVE the pearl f the crown. He HOLDS it up, victoriously, for Annabeth and Grover to see.
He did it.
Not quite. Grover points to the GUARD'S BOOTH. It's EMPTY. Inside the Parthenon, Percy puts the green pearl into his pocket. He is about to FLY AWAY... Suddenly INTERRUPTED..
Get off the statue.  65. Percy looks down. The SECURITY GUARD stands below the statue. He holds a GUN, POINTED at Percy.
Yes, sir.
(extends gun) Now. Percy CLIMBS DOWN the face of the statue. He LANDS on the floor, IN FRONT of the security guard. Percy RAISES his hands. The Security Guard GRINS.
You look familiar.
No...
You're that kid. On the news. The one who killed his Mother.
You're thinking of somebody else...
Naw... It's you. I remember the eyes.
Drop your gun. The Security Guard TURNS. Grover and Annabeth stand a few feet away. Annabeth is holding a BOW and ARROW, POINTED a the Security Guard, who chuckles.
You think an arrow's gonna' stop me?
I'm an Olympian.
I know who you are, daughter of Athena. Annabeth, Grover and Percy exchange a PUZZLED GLANCE. The Security Guard TURNS to Percy.
I've been expecting you, Percy Jackson.
You know me?  66.
Just give me the lightning bolt. And I'll let you go.
I don't have it.

(sighs) I really hoped to avoid this... The Security Guard takes a DEEP BREATH... Then EXHALES... outer SKIN EXPLODES! SHOWERING the room with COUNTLESS FRAGMENTS. Percy, Annabeth and Grover HIDE their eyes. PIECES of the Security Guard FLY BY THEM. All that REMAINS of the security guard, is a thick, swirl PUFF OF SMOKE, on the floor. Percy, Annabeth and Grover slowly WALK to the smoke. They LOOK DOWN. The smoke BEGINS TO CLEAR... REVEALING... A REPTILIAN EYE. More SMOKE CLEARS. TWO EYES appear... Followed by THREE, FOUR... SIX, SEVEN... Percy, Annabeth and Grover STEP BACK. FOURTEEN EYES are revealed... On SEVEN different heads. T heads are REPTILIAN. VICIOUS. SNARLING. The heads RISE UP from the smoke, GROWING high above the kids' heads. The heads FULLY FORM into the GIANT, DRAGON- LIKE BODY of the seven headed...

Annabeth SHOOTS ARROWS at the Hydra. The stinging arrows only make the beast ANGRIER. Its monstrous heads SWOOP DO jaws SNAPPING at Annabeth and Grover.
